00042 class Object

00134 inline std::string Object::objectPageLink(const class Object *object, const std::string &identifier)
00135 {
00136         if (object == 0)
00137                 return identifier;
00138         
00139         return object->pageLink();
00140 }
00141 
00142 inline std::string Object::objectLink(const class Object *object, const std::string &identifier)
00143 {
00144         if (object == 0)
00145                 return identifier;
00146 
00147         std::ostringstream sstream;
00148         sstream << "<a href=\"#n" << object->m_id << "\">" << object->m_identifier << "</a>";
00149         
00150         return sstream.str();
00151 }
00152 
00153 inline int Object::objectId(const class Object *object)
00154 {
00155         if (object == 0)
00156                 return -1;
00157         
00158         return object->m_id;
00159 }

00162 {
00163         Object::maxIds = maxIds;

00166 inline std::string Object::pageLink() const
00167 {
00168         std::ostringstream sstream;
00169         sstream << "<a href=\"" << this->m_id << ".html\">" << this->m_identifier << "</a>";
00170         return sstream.str();
00171 }

00203 inline bool Object::AlphabeticalComparator::operator()(const class Object *first, const class Object *second) const
00204 {
00205         return first->identifier().compare(second->identifier()) < 0;
00206 }

00208 inline std::string Object::showBooleanProperty(const bool &property)
00209 {
00210         if (property)
00211                 return _("Yes");
00212         
00213         return _("No");
00214 }

00221 inline std::string Object::anchor() const
00222 {
00223         std::ostringstream sstream;
00224         
00225         if (Vjassdoc::createPages())
00226                 return this->pageLink();
00227         
00228         return this->m_identifier;
00229 }

00231 inline class Object* Object::searchObjectInList(const std::string &identifier, const enum Parser::List &list, enum Parser::SearchMode searchMode)
00232 {
